body:
I reproduced this using the given gist. [Log output here.](https://gist.githubusercontent.com/cespare/d8129f3b2c0c63a59a90fe2496f80999/raw/8a6de2925f408c881795bff8c545ab488066d922/log.txt)

Relevant bit of the trace:

![screen_20161005100414](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/318501/19123339/181c7ffa-8ae3-11e6-9958-14ab7a25ab9d.png)

I attached [the full trace here](https://github.com/golang/go/files/511852/trace.out.gz). For me, the pause appears in the split 6/8 (15.636125645s-19.117813135s).

**Edit:** I originally posted a trace using Go 1.7. I updated the log and trace using head (dce0df29dd9052c0f00ce8217b9a51a84206e892) instead.
